means: 开始( initiate的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He initiated her into the study of other cultures.
sentence.Network_cn: 他将她领进了研究其他文化的大门。

sentence.Network_en: In many societies, young people are formally initiated into their adult roles.
sentence.Network_cn: 在很多社会里，年轻人经过正式仪式才算成年。

sentence.Network_en: He has not yet been thoroughly initiated into the mysteries of computers.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对计算机的奥秘尚未入门.

entry.def: If you initiate something, you start it or cause it to happen.

example.ex: They wanted to initiate a discussion on economics...
example.tran: 他们想启动一次经济学讨论。

example.ex: The trip was initiated by the manager of the community centre.
example.tran: 这次旅行由社区活动中心的经理发起。

entry.tran: 使初步了解;向…传授基本技巧(或基础知识)
entry.def: If you initiate someone into something, you introduce them to a particular skill or type of knowledge and teach them about it.

example.ex: He initiated her into the study of other cultures.
example.tran: 他将她领进了研究其他文化的大门。

entry.def: If someone is initiated into something such as a religion, secret society, or social group, they become a member of it by taking part in ceremonies at which they learn its special knowledge or customs.

example.ex: In many societies, young people are formally initiated into their adult roles.
example.tran: 在很多社会里,年轻人经过正式仪式才算成年。

example.ex: ...the ceremony that initiated members into the Order.
example.tran: 吸收成员加入会社的仪式

entry.tran: 有初步知识的成员;新入会的人
entry.def: An initiate is a person who has been accepted as a member by a particular group or club and been taught its secrets and skills.

example.ex: Chen was an initiate of a Chinese spiritual discipline.
example.tran: 陈是某个中国神学领域的新入门者。

auth_sentence.content: They also have initiated academic programs on environmental issues.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: They also have initiated academic programs on environmental issues.

auth_sentence.content: Should recruiters respond to Twitter dialogues initiated by candidates?
auth_sentence.res_content: Should recruiters respond to Twitter dialogues initiated by candidates?

Sentence.sentence: It initiated the digital revolution in the film industry.
